subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Lengthened to account for modern equipment and bolstered by dozens of new and vexing trees, the 15th hole at Augusta is an anomaly of analytics that helps determine the Masters champion.
snippet: Lengthened to account for modern equipment and bolstered by dozens of new and vexing trees, the 15th hole at Augusta is an anomaly of analytics that helps determine the Masters champion.
